item.title: 🚚🐄 Moovember Update 2022 - Sogo 5.8.0, Rspamd 3.4.0 and PHP 8.1 Update | Revision B
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description:
Moohoo everyone!

Due to the 2022-11a 2022-11b update, here are the changelogs of the 2022-11a 2022-11b update and the changes of the major version (2022-11).

We´ve released 2022-11b already!
